author: Lisa Beilfuss
title: Pittsburgh Wealth Manager Adds Institutional Heft
text:
Wealth-management firm DB Root & Co. has acquired two advisory teams focused on serving corporate clients, bolstering its institutional business.
Pittsburgh-based DB Root, which handles about 100 companiesâ€™ employee-retirement plans, said the acquisitions of R. Applegate & Associates and Paul Abendroth Group will bring its total assets under advisement to about $5.1 billion.
